name: Python for Beginners
details: Python For Beginners : This course is meant for absolute beginners in programming or in python.

name: Learning Python for Data Analysis
details: Learn python and how to use it to analyze,visualize and present data. Includes tons of sample code and hours of video!

name: The Complete Python Programming Course
details: Learn A-Z everything about Python, from the basics, to advanced topics like Python GUI, Python Data Analysis, and more!

name: Modern React with Redux
details: Master React and Redux with React Router, Webpack, and Create-React-App. Includes Hooks!

name: React basic in just 1 hour [2022]
details: MThe quick guide to learn basic concepts and workflow of how to build React app

name: Selenium WebDriver QA Automation 2022
details: 2 courses in 1. Python and Selenium WebDriver from scratch for Automation Testing, SQL Crash Course, Framework Design and Bootcamp on the React.js essentials: the React Core, React Router, Redux, Hooks, in-depth JS, and detailed guides.
